title: State-of-the-art Fitness Center, On-site Management, Stove
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 65', 'OR Text', '65', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 777 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to life at Retreat at Water’s Edge, your destination for the studio, one, and two-bedroom apartments in Denver, Colorado.', 'Open floor plans welcome you in, and convenient community amenities compliment your lifestyle..', 'Throughout the community, indulge in upscale amenities designed to bring comfort and convenience just steps from your front door.', 'Head into downtown Denver for work or leisure, or stay closer to home to enjoy the stunning parks, exciting shopping, and delicious dining options here in the neighborhood.', 'Schedule your tour of our Denver apartments for rent with us today to find the perfect home for you.', 'Features:', 'Stove, Walk-in Closets*, Balcony or Patio, Dishwasher, Wood Burning Fireplace*, Washer and Dryer in Home*, Electric Fireplace*, Refrigerator', '*In-select Units', 'Community Amenities:', 'Short-term Leasing Available, On-site Management, Elevator, Garages Available for Additional Fee, On-site Laundry Facilities, Barbecue Area, Gas Grill and Firepit, State-of-the-art Fitness Center, Clubhouse, Package Lockers, On-site Maintenance, Dog Park, Shimmering Swimming Pool, Business Center', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow up to 2 pets per home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Give our leasing office a call today to find out more!', 'One Pet:', 'Fee: $250', 'Deposit: $100', 'Monthly Pet Rent: $35', 'Two Pets:', 'Fee: $400', 'Deposit: $200', 'Monthly Pet Rent: $65', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'lDr8cPq3c']
